summary: After giving up her mafia husband to the police, and starting a new life in witness protection, Erin thinks she's rid of Jimmy forever. However, a mysterious stranger has her worrying Jimmy is back.
cast: Mia Kirshner|Madeleine Arthur|James Kirk|Paul McGillion|Venus Terzo|John Cassini|BJ Harrison|Bruce Ramsay|Jenn MacLean-Angus|Yvette Dudley-Neuman|Raul Inglis|Peighton Brown
title: Testigo protegido
